mapper.select: SELECT TEMP_ID, TEMP_TITLE, TEMP_CONTENT, IMG_VALUE, TO_CHAR(TEMP_REGDATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') TEMP_REGDATE FROM TEMPLATE t
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEMPLATE (TEMP_ID, TEMP_TITLE, TEMP_CONTENT, TEMP_REGDATE, IMG_VALUE) VALUES (temp_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{temp_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temp_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_DATE, #{img_value, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
